Package ipi

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FolderPaths  
    Images
    Manipulates images
    Person  
    ResourcePaths  
    Streams
    Streams class provides InputStream readers for Web Start access
    Threads  
    User  
    Views
    Methods to initiate new windows
Version:
1.0 1028-04-01
Author:
Paul I Ighofose FolderPaths class provides default file path attributes and retrieves current working directory Person class gives a default construct for person data Resource class provides default resource path attributes Streams class provides InputStream readers for Web Start access Threads class works with System.in and Process methods to enable web start function in full trust mode User class extends Person class and gives a construct for user data Views class uses Reflect to Invoke methods passed by variable
